short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't let meetings run your company

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scalar Insight is a Chrome extension to help CEOs and others invited see the cost of each meeting they attend or schedule + a dashboard to see the number and cost of all the meetings of their company so that they can get visibility and reduce the time wasted.
